survey_name: Corporate Sustainability Initiatives Employee Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness of current corporate sustainability initiatives and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This question helps assess baseline awareness.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of at your company? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Energy-saving measures (e.g., LED lighting, smart thermostats)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. This helps identify which initiatives have the most visibility.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of at your company? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Energy-saving measures (e.g., LED lighting, smart thermostats)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current sustainability efforts?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Single-choice radio button recommended.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's current sustainability efforts?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your company?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your company?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in company-sponsored sustainability programs (e.g., volunteering, green teams)?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice radio button recommended for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in company-sponsored sustainability programs (e.g., volunteering, green teams)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating in sustainability initiatives? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Initiatives are not relevant to me
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 response is 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating in sustainability initiatives? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Initiatives are not relevant to me
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q5 response is 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'

questions.question_text: How effective do you think your company's communication is regarding sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice radio button recommended for consistency.

script.question_text: How effective do you think your company's communication is regarding sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which communication channels would you prefer for updates on sustainability initiatives? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which communication channels would you prefer for updates on sustainability initiatives? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your company's sustainability initiatives align with your personal values?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice radio button recommended for consistency.

script.question_text: Do you feel that your company's sustainability initiatives align with your personal values?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.
